actions.name: My Cow
actions.description: When the player sees an animal , the user can preform this action to double their cows.

actions.name: Marry My Cows
actions.description: When the player sees a church, the user can preform this action to double their cows.

actions.name: Kill Your Cows
actions.description: When the player sees a graveyard, the user can preform this action kill all other players cows.
